name: Sabotage Bodyguard
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 46 Compo

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/sabotage-body-gaurd

You're a bodyguard who is about to get laid off because your employers aren't scared of the monsters you fight anymore. Thankfully you find a way to make them stronger and harder to fight. Lucky you. All you have to do is keep up with hordes of monsters, each stronger than the last.

If you played it please consider giving a rating on the Ludum Dare site! Every bit if feedback is very welcomed.

Bug Fix [1.2] :

Low companion health -> Increased max health for the two.
